hesml.benchmarks.impl

Class BenchmarkFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • hesml.benchmarks.impl.BenchmarkFactory

  • public class BenchmarkFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    The main aim of this class is to instantiate all the benchmarks in order to hide them to the client code.
    Author:
    Juan Lastra-DÃ­az

      • buildSynsetsDataMatrixEvaluation

        public static void buildSynsetsDataMatrixEvaluation(boolean exportICfeatures,
                                                    IWordNetDB wordnet,
                                                    ITaxonomy wordnetTaxonomy,
                                                    java.lang.String strSimilarityTestFile,
                                                    java.lang.String strOutputCSVfile,
                                                    SimilarityMeasureType[] measureTypes)
                                             throws java.lang.Exception
        This function computes the data matrix for a taxonomy and IC model. The function assumes that the IC model has been previously associated to the taxonomy. The test evaluates the dataset for each measure and builds a data matrix wit the synset pairs and the similarity values reported by each measure.
        Parameters:
        exportICfeatures - Save IC-based features into the output file.
        wordnet - WordNet database
        wordnetTaxonomy - WordNetTaxonomy
        strSimilarityTestFile - Word similarity benchmark filename
        strOutputCSVfile - Output *.csv file
        measureTypes - Similarity measures to be evaluated
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getMultipleICSimilarityMeasuresTest

        public static ISimilarityBenchmark getMultipleICSimilarityMeasuresTest(ITaxonomy taxonomy,
                                                                       IWordNetDB wordnet,
                                                                       java.lang.String strWordPairsFile,
                                                                       CorrelationOutputMetrics outputMetrics,
                                                                       IntrinsicICModelType[] icModels,
                                                                       SimilarityMeasureType[] measureTypes)
                                                                throws java.lang.Exception
        This function returns the test for multiple IC-based similarity measures versus a collection of intrinsic IC models.
        Parameters:
        taxonomy - WordNet taxonomy
        wordnet - WordNet database
        strWordPairsFile - Filename of the word similarity benchmark (dataset)
        outputMetrics -
        icModels - Type of IC models to be evaluated
        measureTypes - Type of the measures to be evaluated
        Returns:
        The benchmark
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getMultipleCorpusICSimilarityMeasuresTest

        public static ISimilarityBenchmark getMultipleCorpusICSimilarityMeasuresTest(ITaxonomy taxonomy,
                                                                             IWordNetDB wordnet,
                                                                             java.lang.String strWordPairsFile,
                                                                             CorrelationOutputMetrics outputMetrics,
                                                                             java.lang.String[] strICPedersenModels,
                                                                             java.lang.String strICfilesDir,
                                                                             CorpusBasedICModelType corpusICmodel,
                                                                             SimilarityMeasureType[] measureTypes)
                                                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        This function returns a benchmark to evaluate a single corpus-based IC model with a collection of Wordnet-based frequency files created by Ted Pedersen.
        Parameters:
        taxonomy - WordNet taxonomy
        wordnet - WprdNet database
        strWordPairsFile - Word similarity benchmark filename
        outputMetrics -
        strICPedersenModels - Collection of WordNet-based frequency files
        strICfilesDir - Directory containing the frequency files
        corpusICmodel - Type of corpus-based IC model to be created
        measureTypes - IC-based similarity measures to be evaluated
        Returns:
        The benchmark
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getCorpusICSimilarityMeasuresTest

        public static ISimilarityBenchmark getCorpusICSimilarityMeasuresTest(ITaxonomy taxonomy,
                                                                     IWordNetDB wordnet,
                                                                     java.lang.String strWordPairsFile,
                                                                     CorrelationOutputMetrics outputMetrics,
                                                                     java.lang.String strICfilesDir,
                                                                     CorpusBasedICModelType[] corpusICmodels,
                                                                     java.lang.String[] strICPedersenModels,
                                                                     SimilarityMeasureType[] measureTypes)
                                                              throws java.lang.Exception
        This function returns a benchmark to evaluate a set of corpus-based IC models defined with their corresponding Wordnet-based frequency files.
        Parameters:
        taxonomy - WordNet taxonomy
        wordnet - WordNet database
        strWordPairsFile - File with the word similarity benchmark
        outputMetrics -
        strICfilesDir - Directory containig the WordNet-based frequency files
        corpusICmodels - Vector of corpus-based IC models
        strICPedersenModels - Vector of frequency files
        measureTypes - Similarity measures to be evaluated
        Returns:
        The benchmark
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getSingleNonICSimilarityMeasureTest

        public static ISimilarityBenchmark getSingleNonICSimilarityMeasureTest(ITaxonomy taxonomy,
                                                                       IWordNetDB wordnet,
                                                                       java.lang.String strWordPairsFile,
                                                                       CorrelationOutputMetrics outputMetrics,
                                                                       SimilarityMeasureType measureType)
                                                                throws java.lang.Exception
        This function creates a benchmark for non IC-based measures. The benchmark instantiates a measure, but an IC mdoel is not created before the evaluation of the measure.
        Parameters:
        taxonomy - WordNet taxonomy
        wordnet - WordNet database
        strWordPairsFile - Word similarity benchmark
        outputMetrics -
        measureType - Measure type to be evaluated
        Returns:
        The benchmark
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
